comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview a report with a chart in it with PPT.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070418-1035

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview a report with a chart in it with PPT.

Expected result:
Exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
